projects.name: Colorado Symphony Website
projects.subtitle: Designing a website for the Colorado Symphony using CSS and HTML from scratch
projects.description: Worked and collaborated with a group to produce the Colorado Symphony website from scratch. I focused on the FAQ, Contact, and About pages. Which can be found here for the Colorado Symphony.

projects.name: Monument for CU Boulder
projects.subtitle: Created a monument for CU Boulder using 3D rendering
projects.description: The monument is meant to be a shared space for students to occupy. Primarily for socialization but when empty could also be used for meditation.

projects.name: User Guide Flyer
projects.subtitle: Created a flyer for nail clippers using adobe photoshop
projects.description: Professionally shot photos and designed the flyer by hand.
